unnormalised: **EV Charging Gets a 'Sholay' Style Boost in Maharashtra!**
normalised: **E V Charging Gets a 'Sholay' Style Boost in Maharashtra!**

unnormalised: Mumbai, Oct 26 – Looks like EVs are finally getting the 'kitne chargers the?' treatment they deserve! Maharashtra is powering up its EV charging infra in a big way.
normalised: Mumbai, October twenty six – Looks like E Vs are finally getting the 'kitne chargers the?' treatment they deserve! Maharashtra is powering up its E V charging infra in a big way.

unnormalised: Remember IIT Bombay? Well, they're leading the charge (pun intended!) with some serious research into fast and efficient charging solutions tailored for Indian conditions.
normalised: Remember I I T Bombay? Well, they're leading the charge (pun intended!) with some serious research into fast and efficient charging solutions tailored for Indian conditions.

unnormalised: Reports suggest that the state government is planning to install hundreds of new charging stations along the Mumbai-Pune Expressway, aiming for one every 50 km or so. No more range anxiety on your trips to Lonavala!
normalised: Reports suggest that the state government is planning to install hundreds of new charging stations along the Mumbai-Pune Expressway, aiming for one every fifty kilometer or so. No more range anxiety on your trips to Lonavala!

unnormalised: Plus, rumours are swirling about subsidies of upto Rs. 10,000 for setting up home charging units. Imagine, charging your Tata Nexon EV overnight for basically peanuts!
normalised: Plus, rumours are swirling about subsidies of up to rupee ten thousand for setting up home charging units. Imagine, charging your Tata Nexon E V overnight for basically peanuts!

unnormalised: Some petrol pumps are converting bays to offer EV charging too. Forget 'petrol pump ke peeche kya hai?' the question now is 'charger milega kya?'. It's a full-on electric revolution!
normalised: Some petrol pumps are converting bays to offer E V charging too. Forget 'petrol pump ke peeche kya hai?' the question now is 'charger milega kya?'. It's a full-on electric revolution!

unnormalised: This could seriously boost EV sales figures.
normalised: This could seriously boost E V sales figures.

unnormalised: Definitely something to keep an eye on!
normalised: Definitely something to keep an eye on!
